data.title: Howard Bresler Obituary - Buffalo Grove, Illinois
data.meta_description: Howard Leslie Bresler, MD, age 82, of Skokie. Family Practice Physician trained at U of Chicago, USPHS head training fellow, American Heart Association research fellow. Staff at Lutheran General Hospital and Ellinwood Medical Associates, 1967-2001. Chairman Dept. Family Practice. Instructor of Medicine U of Illinois. Captain USAF Savannah GA, 1958-60, Sigma Xi. Started new career at Chicago Botanic Garden, Master Gardener, 14 years of bliss. Beloved husband for 56 years of Ruth, nee Shapiro; loving father of Andrea (Robert) Sperling and Dr. Michael (Dr. Audrey Tatar) Bresler; loving and dear Papa of Jared Sperling, Ethan and Eli Bresler, Dana, Liza, and Jacqui Sperling; devoted son of the late Michael Bresler and Charlotte Bresler (late Meyer) Poll; dear brother of Martin Bresler; special brother in law of Fern (late Jerome) Silverman and Michele Bresler; favorite uncle to Peter(Kathy), Justin(Alison), and Ross(Anja) Bresler and their children, and Janet (Michael) Shamberg and Helene (David) Wengerhoff and their children and grandchildren; nephew of the late Ester and Frank Bressler and Hon. Ben Novoselsky; cousin of Terry (Judi) and the late Jerry Bressler. Service Thursday, 10 a.m. at The Chapel, 8851 Skokie Blvd., Skokie (at Niles Center Rd.). Interment Memorial Park. In lieu of flowers, contributions to Chicago Botanic Garden, 1000 Lake Cook Rd., Glencoe, IL 60022. Info The Goldman Funeral Group, www.goldmanfuneralgroup.com (847) 478-1600.
